lead_paragraph: CHUBB--Hendon. Hendon Chubb, an eccentric polymath, died suddenly January 3rd. He was a husband, father, grandfather, brother, artist, writer, psychologist, dog-lover, Yale graduate, rug designer, director and CFO of a Fortune 500 Company, honorary Girl Scout, gardener, officer of the American Cycad Society, vintner, army veteran, civil rights election monitor, early programmer, lover of France, Justice of the Peace, and poet. He was much loved by many and is sorely missed. A service will be held in the spring. 1/3
